Articles.Content:
Why not

Press to meet Tom, Tom the Rock...

why not im biger then he is any ways

press to meet a dark angels interrogator chaplain, but you are torchered to death by him thinking you are the fallen

sure I press it... then they let me go because I'm an inquisitor...

press for mouse to come back but he derails everything.

Pushed. Derailed threads happen.

Press button to have a 50/50 chance of either infinite knowledge or enduring a headfirst reentry on EVA (and surviving, if only barely).

push it hoes for the eva thing sounds like fun

press button for 10 trilion yen but every thing in the world becomes 10 trillion yen more expencive(eh spelling close enough)

push...

press to me Tom the rock...

No idea what/who that is, so no.

Press the button to receive free nothing!

press becuase free is always good

press to meet tom

tom...

push mor ammo for ma cat a pult

press for nord a very angry nord

Nope.avi

Press button to launch a virus attack on the person you hate the most, 25% chance it will attack you instead

Nope, I don't hate anyone that much.

Press button to gain the dance moves of a person of your choice, but there's a 50% chance you will instead gain Commander Shepard's dance moves. This is non-revertible.

Edit: not Alan Shepard, the other one.

push cant be any worse then the ones i have now

press for any tv show you want to come out with there new season but 60% chance when ever you try to watch it the divice you are using will explode

I don't want to push

Push button to kill the person you hate the most, with a 1% chance that you will be the target

How about no.

Push it and receive a free trip to Alaska!

Offer does not include the price of return. See your travel agent for details

Press it, I have the money (technology).

push the button to give humanity warp technology. 5% chance that a warrior race will come and kill us.

Eeeeeeeh I dunno, that's pretty close to Canada.... Hmmm... oh, actually, I have another reason to be on American soil... kekekekeke. *pushes button, proceeds to destroy American government and induce a state of total anarchy, retrieves a friend and then hijacks a plane back to Aus*

Push the button for invincibility... but you cannot move as long as you are being watched, by human or technological 'eyes'.
(what happened to me )

(I'm slow, sorry).

Push yer button. We got da tech, we can run run run!

Same as before: Push the button for invincibility... but you cannot move as long as you are being watched, by human or technological 'eyes'.

thats a pretty easy no. because we have eyes everywhere, you would be a statue.

Push the button for kerbals. includes crashing rockets.

push it sounds like fun

press button for a nekomimi but 2% chance it will be an active bomb instead

nope....

Press the button and you get to land and walk on the Moon, but the mission will have a 50/50 chance of deadly failure.

*Press* I'll survive anyway

Press the button to remove bronies, with a 1% chance that it will turn everyone into bronies instead
press for non derailment threads but they still get derailed my mousse...

push it i will disrail all the threads

press to read minds every time you do you lise one day of your life per second

*Push* Robot dogs don't have lives. They are AIs

Push to gain the power to do whatever you want whenever you want, with a 0.0000000001% chance of you dying instead (You have to be EXTREMELY unlucky to die)
